headline: AM Best Affirms Credit Ratings of AES Global Insurance Company, LLC
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., December 03, 2025--AM Best has affirmed the Financial Strength Rating of A (Excellent) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Rating of "a" (Excellent) of AES Global Insurance Company, LLC (AGIC) (Burlington, VT). The outlook of these Credit Ratings (ratings) is stable.
